name: Truth Seekers
description: What is the project about? A security DAO that does provides software like the Wallet Watcher and the Seeker Wallet. TS goal is to create greater transparency and safety in Web3 projects. What makes your project unique? The first Security Web3 Dao with a full security ecosystem. Own Wallet that will tell users if a project or wallet they are interacting with is high or low risk. The Seeker Wallet also has its own database of scam wallets. This is the first wallet that will help firms be compliant and not interact with wallets that have interactions with Tornado Cash and other mixers. History of your project. Started in 2022 Whatâ€™s next for your project? Keep building more software, marketing and awareness of software, growing security ecosystem and partners. What can your token be used for?
